Godseekers (Age of Sigmar) [1,500pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 1,000 (Chaos - Slaanesh) [1,500pts]

    Rules: At the Double, Forward to Victory, Inspiring Presence

    • Uncategorised

      • Fane of Slaanesh

        Categories: SCENERY, SLAANESH

        Unit Abilities: Locus of Savagery, Power of Slaanesh


        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Locus of Savagery At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly CHAOS SLAANESH HERO within 6" of this terrain feature to make a sacrifice. If you do so, that Hero suffers 1 mortal wound, and you must roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2+ you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO until your next hero phase.

        If that HERO has an artefact of power, they can sacrifice that instead of suffering 1 mortal wound. If they do so, that artefact of power can no longer be used (if a weapon was picked when the artefact of power was selected, that weapon reverts to normal). However, on a roll of 2+, you can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO for the rest of the battle instead of only until your next hero phase.
        Power of Slaanesh If you spend depravity points to summon a unit to the battlefield, and that unit is set up wholly within 12" of this terrain feature, you receive D3 depravity points after that unit has been set up.

    • Leader [940pts]

      • Infernal Enrapturess [140pts]

        Selections: Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody, Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast, Ravaging Claw

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, Leader

        Unit: Infernal Enrapturess, Unit Abilities: Discordant Disruption, Harmonic Alignment, Versatile Instrument, Weapon: Heartstring Lyre: Cacophonous Melody, Heartstring Lyre: Euphonic Blast, Ravaging Claw


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Infernal Enrapturess 6"5105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Discordant Disruption Re-roll successful casting rolls for enemy WIZARDS that are within 24" of one or more models with this ability. In addition, if the re-rolled casting roll is a double, that WIZARD suffers D3 mortal wound after the effects of the spell (if any) have been carried out.
        Harmonic Alignment At the start of your hero phase, you receive 1 depravity point for each friendly INFERNAL ENRAPTURESS that is on the battlefield and part of a Slaanesh army.
        Versatile Instrument Before attacking with a heartstring lyre, choose either the Cacophonous Melody or Euphonic Blast missile weapon characteristics for that shooting attack.

      • Keeper of Secrets [380pts]

        Selections: 2. Progeny of Damnation, 2. Thrill-seeker, 6. Bindings of Slaanesh, Elegant Greatblade, General, Impaling Claws, Sinistrous Hand, Wound Tracker

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, HERO, KEEPER OF SECRETS, MONSTER, SLAANESH, WIZARD, GREATER DAEMON, Behemoth, Leader, General, Artefact

        Artefact: Bindings of Slaanesh, Command Abilities: Excess of Violence, Thrill-seeker, Keeper of Secrets Wounds: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Magic: Magic, Spell: Cacophonic Choir, Progeny of Damnation, Unit: Keeper of Secrets, Unit Abilities: Dark Temptations, Delicate Precision, Sinistrous Hand, Weapon: Elegant Greatblade, Impaling Claws, Sinistrous Hand


        Artefact Artefact Details
        Bindings of Slaanesh At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of the bearer and roll 2D6. If the roll is greater than the enemy HERO's Move characteristic, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that enemy HERO until the end of that phase. In addition, if the roll is greater than that enemy HERO's Wounds characteristic, that enemy HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details
        Excess of Violence You can use this command ability in the combat phase, when it is your turn to pick a unit to fight with. If you do so, pick 1 friendly HEDONITE unit that has already fought once in that combat phase and is wholly within 12" of a model with this command ability. That unit can be selected to fight for a second time if it is within 3" of any enemy units. You cannot pick the same unit to benefit from this command ability more than once in the same combat phase.
        Thrill-seeker This general can run and still charge later in the same turn. If this general already has an ability that allows them to run and still charge later in the same turn, add 3 to run rolls for this general instead.
        Keeper of Secrets Wounds MoveElegant GreatbladeImpaling Claws
        00-03 14"55
        04-06 12"34
        07-09 10"33
        10-12 8"23
        13+ 6"22
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Magic 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Cacophonic Choir
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Cacophonic Choir 6Roll 2D6. Each enemy unit within 6" of the caster that has a Bravery characteristic of less than the roll suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Progeny of Damnation 7Pick 1 friendly DAEMON HEDONITE HERO within 6" of the caster that is visible to them. You can heal D3 wounds allocated to that HERO. If the casting roll was 10+, you can heal D6 wounds allocated to that HERO instead of D3.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Keeper of Secrets *14104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Dark Temptations At the start of the combat phase, you can pick 1 enemy HERO within 3" of this model and ask your opponent if they wish that HERO to accept temptation. If they refuse, that HERO suffers D3 mortal wounds. If they accept, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO. Then, at the start of the next combat phase, roll a dice. On 1-3, that HERO no longer receives this modifier to their hit rolls. On 4-6, that HERO is slain.
        Delicate Precision If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by this model is 6, that attack inflicts a number of mortal wounds equal to the Damage characteristic of the weapon used for the attack and the attack sequence ends (do not make a save roll).
        Sinistrous Hand If this model is armed with a Sinistrous Hand, at the end of the combat phase, if any enemy models were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D3 wounds allocated to this model. If any enemy HEROES were slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks in that combat phase, you can heal D6 wounds allocated to this model instead.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Elegant Greatblade Melee2"*3+3+-12
        Impaling Claws Melee3"23+3+-2*
        Sinistrous Hand Melee1"12+3+-11

      • Slaves to Darkness Daemon Prince [210pts]

        Selections: Hellforged Sword, Malefic Talons, Slaanesh

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, MONSTER, HERO, DAEMON PRINCE, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, Leader, KHORNE, NURGLE, SLAANESH

        Unit: Daemon Prince, Unit Abilities: Bounding Charge, Fly, Hellforged Sword, Immortal Champion, Revel in Agony, Weapon: Hellforged Sword, Malefic Talons


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Daemon Prince 12"8103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Bounding Charge Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this model if it charged in the same turn.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Hellforged Sword If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Hellforged Sword is 6, that attack inflicts 2 mortal wounds on the target and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Immortal Champion This model fights at the start of the combat phase. This model cannot fight again in that phase unless an ability or spell allows it to fight more than once.
        Revel in Agony You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase if this model has the SLAANESH keyword. If you do so, until your next hero phase, if any models from a friendly SLAVES TO DARKNESS SLAANESH unit wholly within 12" of this model are slain by an attack made with a melee weapon by an enemy unit, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by that friendly unit that target that enemy unit until your next hero phase. You cannot use this command ability more than once per turn.

        Hellforged Sword Melee2"44+3+-1D3
        Malefic Talons Melee1"33+3+-2

      • The Contorted Epitome [210pts]

        Selections: 3. Hysterical Frenzy, Coiled Tentacles, Ravaging Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, HERALD OF SLAANESH, HERO, SLAANESH, HEDONITE, WIZARD, Leader

        Magic: Magic, Spell: Hysterical Frenzy, Overwhelming Acquiescence, Unit: The Contorted Epitome, Unit Abilities: Gift of Power, Horrible Fascination, Swallow Energy, Weapon: Coiled Tentacles, Ravaging Claws


        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known
        Magic 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, and Overwhelming Acquiescence
        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Hysterical Frenzy 7Pick 1 enemy unit wholly within 18" of the caster that is visible to them, and roll 1 dice for each model in that unit. For each 6, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.
        Overwhelming Acquiescence 7You can pick up to D3 enemy units within 24" of the caster that are visible to them. You can re-roll hit rolls of 1 for attacks that target those units until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        The Contorted Epitome 12"7105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Gift of Power You can re-roll casting, unbinding and dispelling rolls for this model.
        Horrible Fascination At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly models with this ability. On a 4+, that unit fights at the end of that combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight with in that combat phase.

        If a unit that is affected by this ability is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Swallow Energy Roll a dice each time you allocate a mortal wound to this model. On a 2+, that mortal wound is negated.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage
        Coiled Tentacles Melee3"23+4+-22
        Ravaging Claws Melee1"93+4+-11

    • Battleline [290pts]

      • Chaos Warriors [180pts]

        Selections: 2x 5 Chaos Warriors [180pts], Hornblower, Pairs of Chaos Hand Weapons, Slaanesh, Standard Bearer

        Categories: CHAOS, MORTAL, SLAVES TO DARKNESS, CHAOS WARRIORS, Battleline, SLAANESH

        Unit: Chaos Warriors, Unit Abilities: Aspiring Champion, Hornblower, Legions of Chaos, Pairs of Chaos Hand Weapons, Standard Bearer, Weapon: Chaos Hand Weapons


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Chaos Warriors 5"274+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Aspiring Champion 1 model in this unit can be an Aspiring Champion. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that model’s melee weapons.
        Hornblower 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. Add 1 to run and charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Hornblowers.
        Legions of Chaos You can re-roll save rolls for attacks that target this unit while it has at least 10 models.
        Pairs of Chaos Hand Weapons You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made with a pair of Chaos Hand Weapons.
        Standard Bearer 1 in every 5 models in this unit can be a Standard Bearer. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of this unit while it includes any Standard Bearers.

      • Daemonettes [110pts]

        Selections: 10 Daemonettes [110pts], Banner Bearer(s), Hornblower(s), Icon Bearer(s), Piercing Claws

        Categories: CHAOS, DAEMON, DAEMONETTE, SLAANESH, Battleline

        Unit: Daemonettes of Slaanesh, Unit Abilities: Alluress, Banner Bearers, Hornblower, Icon and Standard Bearers, Icon Bearer, Lithe and Swift, Weapon: Piercing Claws


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Daemonettes of Slaanesh 6"1105+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Alluress The leader of this unit is the Alluress. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of an Alluress' Piercing Claws.
        Banner Bearers You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Banner Bearers.
        Hornblower 1 in every 10 models in this unit can be a Hornblower. If the unmodified roll for a battleshock test for an enemy unit that is within 6" of any friendly Hornblowers is 1, that battleshock test must be re-rolled.
        Icon and Standard Bearers 1 in every 5 models in this unit can either be a Daemonette Banner Bearer or Daemonette Icon Bearer.
        Icon Bearer If an unmodified battleshock roll of 1 is made for this unit while it includes any Daemonette Icon Bearers, you can add D6 models to this unit, and no models from this unit will flee in that phase
        Lithe and Swift This unit can run and still charge later in the same turn.

        Selections: Alurer's Flensing Whips, Daemonettes' Piercing Claws, Steeds' Poisoned Tongues

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave
        Exalted Seeker Chariot 10"9104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Excess of Blades Roll a dice for each enemy unit that is within 1" of this model after this model finishes a charge move. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2-4, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 5+, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.
        Pungent Soulscent At the start of the combat phase, roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this model. On a 2+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, for each 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s melee weapons until the end of that phase.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Slaanesh

          Selections: Godseekers Host

          Battalion Organisation: Godseekers Hedonite Host, Battle Trait: Euphoric Killers, Feast of Depravities, Hosts of Slaanesh, Locus of Diversion, Maniacal Hunters, Thundering Cavalcade, Depravity Point Table: (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets, (02) 30 Daemonettes, (03) 3 Seeker Chariots, (04) 20 Daemonettes, (05) 1 Contorted Epitome, (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot, (07) 3 Feinds, (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer, (09) 1 Exalted Chariot, (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh, (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot, (12) 1 Hellflayer, (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh, (14) 1 Seeker Chariot, (15) 5 Seekers, (16) 10 Daemonettes


        Battalion Organisation Required
        Godseekers Hedonite Host A Hedonite Host in a GODSEEKERS HOST army must have0-2 Epicurean Revellers battalions and 2-4 Seeker Cavalcade battalions instead of 1-3.
        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details
        Euphoric Killers If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by a CHAOS SLAANESH model is 6, that attack inflicts 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. If the attacking model’s unit has 20 or more models, its attacks inflict 3 hits on an unmodified hit roll of 6 instead.
        Feast of Depravities You can summon units of SLAANESH DAEMONS to the battlefield if you collect enough depravity points (DPs). Each time a wound or mortal wound is inflicted on an enemy model by an attack made by a friendly SLAANESH HERO or a spell cast by a friendly SLAANESH HERO, and that enemy model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point. In addition, every time a wound or mortal wound is allocated to a friendly SLAANESH HERO and not negated, and that friendly model is not slain by that wound or mortal wound, you receive 1 depravity point.

        If you have any depravity points at the end of your movement phase, you can summon one or more units from the list below to the battlefield, and add them to your army. Each unit you summon costs a number of depravity points, as shown on the list, and you can only summon a unit if you have enough depravity points to pay its cost. Summoned units must be set up wholly within 12" of a friendly SLAANESH HERO and more than 9" from any enemy units. Subtract the cost of the summoned unit from the number of depravity points you have immediately after it has been set up.
        Hosts of Slaanesh After you have chosen the Slaanesh allegiance for your army, you must also choose a Host of Slaanesh keyword for your army. You can choose for your army to be an INVADERS HOST, a PRETENDERS HOST, or a GODSEEKERS HOST. All units in your army gain the keyword of the host that you have chosen. All units with that keyword benefit from the host’s allegiance abilities, which are presented on the following pages, in addition to the allegiance abilities they have for being from a Slaanesh army.
        Locus of Diversion At the end of the charge phase, each friendly HEDONITE HERO that is within 6" of an enemy unit can create a locus of diversion. If they do so, pick 1 enemy unit that is within 6" of that HEDONITE HERO and roll a dice, adding 2 if that HEDONITE HERO is a GREATER DAEMON. On a 5+, that enemy unit fights at the end of the following combat phase, after the players have picked any other units to fight in that combat phase. You cannot pick the same unit as the target for this ability more than once in the same charge phase (whether the roll is successful or not).

        If a unit that is affected by this battle trait is also affected by any rules that would allow it to fight at the start of the following combat phase, that unit is not affected by this rule or those other rules (the effects cancel each other out).
        Maniacal Hunters At the end of your charge phase, you receive D3 depravity points if any friendly GODSEEKERS HOST units made a charge move in that phase. If 3 or more friendly GODSEEKERS HOST units made a charge move in that phase, you receive D6 depravity points instead of D3.
        Thundering Cavalcade Add 1 to charge rolls for units in a GODSEEKERS HOST army.
        Depravity Point Table Cost
        (01) 1 Keeper of Secrets 45
        (02) 30 Daemonettes 40
        (03) 3 Seeker Chariots 35
        (04) 20 Daemonettes 28
        (05) 1 Contorted Epitome 23
        (06) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Exalted Chariot 23
        (07) 3 Feinds 23
        (08) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Hellflayer 20
        (09) 1 Exalted Chariot 20
        (10) 1 Infernal Enrapturess, Herald of Slaanesh 17
        (11) 1 Bladebringer, Herald on Seeker Chariot 17
        (12) 1 Hellflayer 17
        (13) 1 Viceleader, Herald of Slaanesh 15
        (14) 1 Seeker Chariot 15
        (15) 5 Seekers 15
        (16) 10 Daemonettes 14

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1000 Points - Vanguard

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

    • Malign Sorcery [40pts]

      • Endless Spell: Dreadful Visage [40pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Dreadful Visage, Unit Abilities: Fly, Predatory, Swooping Horror, Terrifying Entity


        Spell Casting ValueDescription
        Summon Dreadful Visage 7Only CHAOS SLAANESH WIZARDS can attempt to cast this spell. If successfully cast, set up 1 Dreadful Visage model wholly within 12" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Predatory A Dreadful Visage is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Swooping Horror When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Terrifying Entity Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of units while they are within 12" of this model. Add 1 to the Bravery characteristic of CHAOS SLAANESH units while they are within 12" of this model instead of subtracting 1.

    • Command Points [50pts]

      • Purchased Command Points [50pts]

        Selections: 1 Command Point [50pts]

        Categories: Command Points

Force Rules

At the Double: You can use this command ability after you make a run roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, the run roll is treated as being a 6.

Forward to Victory: You can use this command ability after you make a charge roll for a friendly unit that is within 6" of a friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. If you do so, re-roll the charge roll.

Inspiring Presence: You can use this command ability at the start of the battleshock phase. If you do so, pick a friendly unit that is within 6" of friendly HERO, or 12" of a friendly HERO that is a general. That unit does not have to take battleshock tests in that phase.
